desc: Calls down waves of fire that damage enemy units in the target area, burning for additional damage over time.
notes:
1:The Firestorm burn is dispellable with any dispel.
2:Attempts to damage if debuff was placed before spell immunity.

Cast Range: 750Effect Radius: 400Number of Waves: 6Wave Interval: 1
Damage per Wave: 25/40/55/70
Max HP Burn Damage: 0.75%/1.5%/2.25%/3%
Burn Duration: 2
cmb:
100/110/120/130
12
lore: The flames of conquest blaze forth from the darkest depths of the abyss.
name: underlord_firestorm

desc: To merely stand in the presence of the Underlord is to feel the conviction of battle sapped from one's soul.

desc: Opens a dark rift at the targeted friendly unit's position. After a short delay, Underlord and all nearby friendly heroes are teleported to that unit's location. Dark Rift can be cancelled at any time during the cast. If it is cancelled in this way, or the target unit dies before the spell becomes active, Dark Rift goes into cooldown.
cmb:
75/150/225
130/120/110
lore: They come without warning, leaving fire and blood where kingdoms once flourished.
name: underlord_dark_rift
